annonstext:
Did you know that fishing is the world’s most popular hobby? We do! And here at Fishbrain we have created the world’s largest social network dedicated to people who love fishing. We want to make sure that we can give them the greatest experience possible and make their fishing dreams come true, no matter where they are in the world.

We have over 11 million users all over the world who have logged over 10 million catches in our app. We’re growing fast, both in our social network and in the company, which is why we’re looking for a SEO Outreach Specialist.

ALL APPLICATIONS MUST BE IN ENGLISH

Responsibilities:

We’re looking for a creative SEO outreach specialist to help us build awareness and authority of our brand. This role will primarily focus on creating outreach strategies that attract influencers, bloggers, and other website owners to link to our site and talk about our brand. You will also be called upon to analyze existing backlinks and stay on top of anything that appears unhealthy to the success of our SEO.  

To succeed in this role you must be creatively minded, not deterred by rejection, and agile enough to alter your strategy as needed. In addition to outreach, you may be called on to assist with other junior-level SEO-related tasks such as adjusting content, meta-data, and more.

Responsibilities

	Drive outreach strategy with the intent of acquiring quality backlinks.
	Work with internal teams and external partners to execute on that strategy.
	Use a variety of tools and advanced Google search techniques to identify opportunities. 
	Qualify and prioritize opportunities.
	Reach out to website owners, bloggers and other online influencers through email, social media and by phone.
	Identify opportunities using our data and content to attract links
	Regularly analyze existing backlink profile and submit disavow requests as needed.

 

Requirements

	Understanding of the SEO space, especially as it relates to off-site.
	A minimum of 1 year SEO experience.
	Ability to work hours that coincide with CET and US Time Zones (ideally work hours in E.S.T)
	Effective communication skills including solid understanding of English grammar and professional writing ability.
	Internet-savvy creative that can build relationships through online communities.
	Proficient in conducting online research.
	Ability to spot, analyze and take advantage of trends.
	An understanding of how to create backlink and outreach strategies and execute on them.

Some Preferred "Nice to Haves"

	Digital PR or Communications experience or study
	Prior experience working as an outreach specialist for link-driven campaigns.
	Knowledge of commonly used SEO tools such as SEMRush and AHrefs
	Knowledge of analytics tools such as Google Analytics

Our Bait 

We have trust in our employees which means that 1. you will be given a lot of responsibility from day one and 2. we value your opinions and ideas. No matter the team, everything we do has an impact on our users and on Fishbrain as a company. Our culture is very important to us. If you have a “win as a team” mentality, are passionate and like to have fun, then Fishbrain is the place for you!
